articles.author: ICC
articles.title: Out-of-form India star gets Ponting's backing for World Cup spot - ICC Cricket
articles.description: Australia legend Ricky Ponting has revealed what he would do with out-of-form white-ball star Suryakumar Yadav and the rest of India's much-vaunted batting line-up if he was in charge of selecting their squad for this year's ICC Men's Cricket World Cup.
